Effect.en: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned to a zone that is not the center Main Monster Zone, destroy this card. Gains 3000 ATK while it is in the center Main Monster Zone. Once per turn: You can choose 1 of your unused Main Monster Zones; move this card in your Main Monster Zone to that zone, then destroy all other cards in the same columns as its previous zone, its current zone, and all zones in between.
